meanings.definition: A person who organizes or arranges things according to a system.
meanings.sent1: The systematist carefully labeled all the files in alphabetical order.
meanings.sent2: The systematist created a detailed schedule for the project.
meanings.sent3: The systematist joked that even their sock drawer was perfectly organized.
meanings.sent4: She was a true systematist, turning chaos into order effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The systematist's precision in arranging books by genre was impressive.

meanings.definition: A person who advocates for or follows a particular system or method.
meanings.sent1: As a systematist, he always promoted the benefits of time management.
meanings.sent2: The team leader was a dedicated systematist, adhering strictly to the established procedures.
meanings.sent3: The systematist proudly displayed their collection of efficiency manuals.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the systematist of the office, ensuring everyone followed the guidelines.
meanings.sent5: The systematist's commitment to the company's protocols never wavered.
